title: The Ropemaker
description: Copyright date 2001, first edition, fourth printing. Michael L. Printz award for excellence and young adult literature Winner, label attached. Tan and purple cover over boards with gold lettering and design on the spine. No tears, bent pages, nor any writing. Dust Jacket, no tears bent flaps nor is it price clipped. Dust jacket now in a clear protective cover. Text is bright and clean, binding is secure, a solid book.
author: Peter Dickinson
